# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s)
    current_length = 0
    wrapped_string = ""
    
    for word in words
        if current_length + length(word) > text_width
            wrapped_string = string(wrapped_string, "\n", word, " ")
            current_length = length(word) + 1
        else
            wrapped_string = string(wrapped_string, word, " ")
            current_length += length(word) + 1
        end
    end
    
    return wrapped_string
end

# Example usage
s = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua."
wrapped = wrap_string(s)
println(wrapped)
```
